query: SELECT a.id, a.tipo, a.texto as texto_curto, b.texto as texto_longo FROM historicoTextos a JOIN historicoTextos b ON a.tipo = b.tipo AND b.texto LIKE CONCAT(a.texto, '%') AND a.id != b.id AND LENGTH(a.texto) < LENGTH(b.texto) LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3v7At4WPQpm4aRf.9e6a8ae0e28e --database bSA4q7aMJsJeSmafooCq7A --execute SELECT a.id, a.tipo, a.texto as texto_curto, b.texto as texto_longo FROM historicoTextos a JOIN historicoTextos b ON a.tipo = b.tipo AND b.texto LIKE CONCAT(a.texto, '%') AND a.id != b.id AND LENGTH(a.texto) < LENGTH(b.texto) LIMIT 20;
